title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 66.2 - Standards for passing examinations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 66.2 - Standards for passing examinations

State Regulations
[Statutory authority: Civil Service Law, ยง7 ] No
candidate shall be passed in an examination or have his name entered upon an
eligible list who fails to attain a passing mark in the examination as a whole, or who fails to meet minimum standards prescribed for any subject or parts of
subjects of the examination; provided, however, that a candidate whose
performance rating is unsatisfactory may be passed in a promotion examination
if he meets minimum standards and receives a passing mark in all other subjects
and parts of subjects of the examination. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
66.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
